chapters.title: Chapter 1: Seeds of Shadow
chapters.info: Gawyn Trakand, p. 22 (9)—Son of Queen Morgase of Andor, brother of Elayne and half-brother of Galad. He will become First Prince of the Sword when his sister becomes Queen. He is in Tar Valon training with the Warders, as all sons of Andoran queens must do. Gawyn has feelings for Egwene al'Vere, and she returns them, but he refuses to even express his interests since Galad has a crush on Egwene as well. His sign is a white boar. See also Damodred, Galadedrid; Damodred, Taringail; Trakand, Elayne; Trakand, Morgase.
